column6: Thanos is outnumbered and outgunned by the Cancerverse forces, and his unlikely allies-Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon and the other brave misfits-find themselves making a last stand to save the galaxy's #1 villain!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | artist:Aleksi Briclot | penciller:Miguel Angel Sepulveda
